Verses: 1 pilaaththu Sila Galileyarudaiya Raththaththai Avargaludaiya Baligalode Kalandhirundhaan; Andha Velaiyile Ange Irundhavargalil Silar Andhachcheydhiyai Avarukku Ariviththaargal.
2 yesu Avargalukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Andhak Galileyarukku Appadippattavaigal Sambaviththadhinaale, Matra Ellaak Galileyaraip Paarkkilum Avargal Paavigalaayirundhaargalendru Ninaikkireergalo?
3 appadiyallavendru Ungalukkuch Sollugiren; Neengal Mananthirumbaamarponaal Ellaarum Appadiye Kettuppoveergal.
4 seelovaamile Gopuram Vizhundhu Padhinettupperaik Kondradhe; Erusalemil Kudiyirukkira Manusharellaarilum Avargal Kutravaaligalaayirundhaargalendru Ninaikkireergalo?
5 appadiyallavendru Ungalukkuch Sollugiren, Neengal Mananthirumbaamarponaal Ellaarum Appadiye Kettuppoveergal Endraar.
6 appozhudhu Avar Oru Uvamaiyaiyum Sonnaar: Oruvan Than Thiraatchath Thottaththil Oru Aththimaraththai Nattirundhaan; Avan Vandhu Adhile Kaniyaith Thedinabodhu Ondrung Kaanavillai.

7 appozhudhu Avan Thottakkaaranai Nokki: Idho, Moondru Varushamaai Indha Aththimaraththile Kaniyaith Thedivarugiren; Ondraiyung Kaanavillai, Idhai Vettippodu, Idhu Nilaththaiyum En Kedukkiradhu Endraan.
8 adharku Avan: Aiyaa, Idhu Indhavarushamum Irukkattum; Naan Idhaich Sutrilung Koththi, Eruppoduven,
9 kanikoduththaal Sari, Kodaavittaal, Inimel Idhai Vettippodalaam Endru Sonnaan Endraar.
10 oru Oivunaalil Avar Jebaaalayaththil Podhagampannikkondirundhaar.
11 appozhudhu Padhinettu Varushamaaip Balaveenappaduththum Aaviyaik Konda Oru Sthiree Angeyirundhaal. Aval Evvalavum Nimirakkoodaadha Kooniyaayirundhaal.
12 yesu Avalaik Kandu, Thammidaththil Azhaiththu: Sthireeye, Un Balaveenaththinindru Vidudhalaiyaakkappattaai Endru Solli,
13 avalmel Thamadhu Kaigalai Vaiththaar; Udane Aval Nimirndhu, Dhevanai Magimaippaduththinaal.

14 yesu Oivunaalile Sosdhamaakkinapadiyaal, Jebaaalayaththalaivan Kobamadaindhu, Janangalai Nokki: Velaiseygiradharku Aarunaal Unde, Andha Naatkalile Neengal Vandhu Sosdhamaakkikkollungal, Oivunaalile Appadich Seyyalaagaadhu Endraan.

15 karththar Avanukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Maayakkaarane, Ungalil Evanum Oivunaalil Than Erudhaiyaavadhu Than Kazhudhaiyaiyaavadhu Thozhuvaththilirundhu Avizhththukkondupoi, Adharkuth Thanneer Kaattugiradhillaiyaa?
16 idho, Saaththaan Padhinettu Varushamaaik Kattiyirundha Aabiragaamin Kumaaraththiyaagiya Ivalai Oivunaalil Indhakkattilirundhu Avizhththuvidavendiyadhillaiyaa Endraar.
17 avar Appadich Sonnapodhu, Avarai Virodhiththirundha Anaivarum Vetkappattaargal. Janangalellaarum Avaraal Seyyappatta Sagala Magimaiyaana Seygaigalaikkuriththum Sandhoshappattaargal.
18 avar Avargalai Nokki: Dhevanudaiya Raajyam Edharkoppaayirukkiradhu; Adhai Edharku Oppiduven?

19 adhu Oru Kaduguvidhaikku Oppaayirukkiradhu; Adhai Oru Manushan Eduththuth Than Thottaththile Pottaan; Adhu Valarndhu, Periya Maramaayitru; Aagaayaththup Paravaigal Vandhu, Adhin Kilaigalil Adaindhadhu Endraar.
20 melum Avar: Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththai Naan Edharku Oppiduven?
21 adhu Puliththamaavukku Oppaayirukkiradhu; Adhai Oru Sthiree Eduththu Muzhuvadhum Pulikkumvaraikkum Moondrupadimaavile Adakkivaiththaal Endraar.
22 avar Erusalemukkup Pirayaanamaaip Pogumpodhu, Pattanangaldhorum Giraamangaldhorum Ubadhesampannikkondu Ponaar.
23 appozhudhu Oruvan Avarai Nokki: Aandavare, Ratchikkappadugiravargal Silaperdhaano Endru Kettaan; Adharku Avar:
24 idukkamaana Vaasalvazhiyaai Utpiravesikkap Pirayaasappadungal, Anegar Utpiravesikka Vagaidhedinaalum Avargalaale Koodaamarpogum Endru Ungalukkuch Sollugiren.

25 veettejamaan Ezhundhu, Kadhavaippoottina Pinbu, Neengal Veliye Nindru Aandavare, Aandavare, Engalukkuththirakka Vendumendru Sollik Kadhavaith Thattumpodhu, Avar Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Neengal Evvidaththaaro, Ungalai Ariyen Endru Ungalukkuch Solluvaar.
26 appozhudhu Neengal: Ummudaiya Samugaththil Pojanabaanampanninome, Neer Engal Veedhigalil Podhagampannineere Endru Solluveergal.
27 aanaalum Avar: Neengal Evvidaththaaro, Ungalai Ariyen, Akkiramakkaararaagiya Neengalellaarum Ennaivittu Agandrupongal Endru Solvaar Endru Ungalukkuch Sollugiren.

28 neengal Aabiragaamaiyum Eesaakkaiyum Yaakkobaiyum Sagala Theerkkadharisigalaiyum Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththilirukkiravargalaagavum, Ungalaiyo Purambe Thallappattavargalaagavum Kaanumbodhu Ungalukku Azhugaiyum Parkadippum Ange Undaayirukkum.
29 kizhakkilum Merkilum Vadakkilum Therkilum Irundhu Janangal Vandhu, Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththil Pandhiyiruppaargal.
30 appozhudhu Mundhinor Pindhinoraavaargal, Pindhinor Mundhinoraavaargal Endraar.
31 andha Naalile Sila Pariseyar Avaridaththil Vandhu: Neer Ivvidaththai Vittup Poividum; Erodhu Ummaikkolaiseyya Manadhaai Irukkiraan Endraargal.
32 adharku Avar: Naan Indraikkum Naalaikkum Pisaasugalaith Thuraththi, Viyaadhiyullavargalaich Sosdhamaakki, Moondraamnaalil Niraivadaiven.
33 indraikkum Naalaikkum Marunaalaikkum Naan Nadamaadavendum; Erusalemukkup Purambe Oru Theerkkadharisiyum Madindhupogiradhillaiyendru Naan Sonnadhaaga, Neengal Poi Andha Narikkuch Sollungal.

34 erusaleme, Erusaleme, Theerkkadharisigalaik Kolaiseydhu, Unnidaththil Anuppappattavargalaik Kallerigiravale! Kozhi Than Kunjugalaith Thansiragugalin Keezhe Koottich Serththukkollumvannamaaga Naan Eththanaidharamo Un Pillaigalaik Koottich Serththukkolla Manadhaayirundhen; Ungalukko Manadhillaamarpoyitru.

35 idho, Ungal Veedu Ungalukkup Paazhaakkividappadum; Karththarudaiya Naamaththinaale Varugiravar Sthoththirikkappattavar Endru Neengal Sollungaalam Varumalavum Ennaik Kaanaadhiruppeergal Endru Meyyaagave Ungalukkuch Sollugiren Endraar.
